item.title: New York Case Against Trump Was Always A Ridiculous Pretext To Take Down His Campaign
item.description: The prosecution was the passion project of pit bull New York Attorney General Letitia James, who made a malicious campaign promise to sue Trump.

item.title: Could Parental Rights Be The Deciding Issue In Virginia’s Gubernatorial Race (Again)?
item.description: The parental rights issues that defined Virginia's 2021 elections appear to be taking center stage yet again in the state's 2025 contests.
